data.title: What to Expect During Your Visit
data.meta_description: As a potential patient, here's what to expect when visiting Joseph Gowen, O.D. & Associates and our expert team of eye health professionals.
data.text:
See the Difference with Our Reliable Eye Care

Vision care you can trust year after year in Pueblo, CO.

We know you want affordable, quality eyecare in Pueblo. That’s why when you visit Joseph Gowen, O.D. & Associates, you can expect top-notch customer service and a team who knows and cares about you.

Get the Most Out of Your Next Eye Exam



Arrive 15 Minutes Early

Come in 15 minutes before your scheduled appointment so we can ensure your insurance details are in order.



Same-day Glasses & Contacts

Thanks to our partnership with Eyemart Express and our full stock of the most popular contact lenses, get ready to see better the same day as your appointment.



We'll See You Again

Even better? Leave knowing you don’t have to restart the whole process again next time you need eye care. We’ll remember your eye needs so we’ll be ready to serve you again.



More than Routine Care

Our doctor can treat all your eyecare needs—whether you need contact lenses or a diabetic eye evaluation, count on us for personalized care.



A Team You Can Trust

Leave feeling confident that you got your money’s worth for a great appointment and an eye evaluation you can trust.



Any Questions?

Give us a call. Our team is here to answer any questions you might have about your upcoming eye appointment.

“Love going to Dr. Gowen. He is always fast but thorough. Only tells you what you need. No hidden agenda. Thank you Doc.”

-Philip

“The staff, including the doctor, is so incredibly friendly and fast! Not to mention even without insurance it’s affordable!! This is now my go-to doctor for my eye checks from here on out! Definitely recommend to anybody!”

-Jessica

“He was very informative and listened to my issues about driving at night and other problems with my eyes …very nice and great customer service skills.”

-Marion

The Joseph Gowen, O.D. & Associates Difference

Count on us to truly care about your vision and well-being, while listening to your concerns.



Accessible quality care

With over 12 years in Southern Colorado, we bring consistent, established quality care to Pueblo and the surrounding area, because great eye care should be accessible to everyone.



Doctors you can trust

Our doctors are known for their unparalleled chairside manner. When you ask a question, they listen and answer. When you encounter something new, they explain it in an easy-to-understand way.



Same-Day Service

We partner with Eyemart Express and we fully stock Air Optix in our clinic so that you can get the lenses you need the same day as your exam. We don’t make you wait for the vision assistance you need today.
